Posts.Content: I read a paper about breast cancer subclassification. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2705275/ I build the below matrix: EP    PR    HERO2    Subtype 0          0        0               4 0          0        1               3 0          1        0              2 0          1        1              1 1           0        0              2 1           0         1             1 1           1          0             2 1           1           1             1 I have a data set which has EP/PR and Hero2. Some of the patients under Hero2 are "equivocal (score 2+)" So I am confused to consider Hero2 as 1 or 0? I appreciate your clarification on this.
Posts.Title: asking about breast cancer sub-classification
